about_the_game:
Money Trails is a casual clicker / idler game with city building elements and procedurally generated environments. Travel in your limousine on a path to choose new building ventures that increase your wealth and evolve your Island. Add money by clicking while earning passive income when idle. Random alerts and messages received on your Personal Digital Assistant can have positive or negative effects on your earnings and goals. You may need to make stops along the way to shop and replenish. Every trip is a new procedurally generated adventure!

  • BECOME A BILLIONAIRE

    Your limousine is ready, Boss.

  • TRAVEL IN YOUR LIMO

    Roll the windows, turn on the radio and ride through procedurally generated, one of a kind biomes. 

  • COUNT YOUR MONEY

    Click and work to increase your wealth.

  • EARN PASSIVE INCOME

    Sit back, relax or multi-task while your wealth automatically grows.

  • MANAGE YOUR COSTLY VICES

    Negative effects may occur. 

  • RECEIVE ALERTS ON YOUR PDA

    Random incoming messages lead to positive or negative outcomes.

  • DECIDE WHAT TO BUY

    Stop your limo and shop for what you need to keep going.

  • CHOOSE WHAT TO BUILD

    Choose between different construction opportunities.

  • GROW YOUR ISLAND

    The more you travel and build, the more your bank account and island will endlessly evolve.

short_description: Venture out in the back of your limousine and decide what to buy or build to grow your endless procedurally generated island. Add up your money, increase your passive income and receive random alerts on your Personal Digital Assistant while you travel.
